title: 01x3: Office of Legal Counsel Opinions (Exception to Honoraria Ban and Communications under 18 U.S.C. § 207(c))
summary:
The Office of Legal Counsel issued an opinion about payments to charitable organizations in lieu of honoraria (an exception to honoraria ban) and an opinion about communications under 18 U.S.C. § 207(c).  

Notes: [Note: The honoraria ban was held unconstitutional by the U.S. Supreme Court in U.S. v. National Treasury Employees Union, 513 U.S. 454 (1995).]
